title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. V, subch. H, art. 2, pt. 380, subpt. 380-1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. V, subch. H, art. 2, pt. 380, subpt. 380-1 - Applicability

State Regulations
ยง 380-1.1 - Applicability

The provisions in this Part shall be applicable to Paid

Family Leave. The definitions included in Part 355 of this Subchapter shall be
applicable to the sections herein. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. V, subch. H, art. 2, pt. 380, subpt. 380-1

Adopted

New

York State Register July 19, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 29, eff. 7/19/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
